pr_title: use objdump to check architecture of .a files on Linux.

timeline.message:
use objdump to check architecture of .a files on Linux.
If objdump sees the file has an unsupported architecture, it will return with 1.
In that case, we ignore the file (and don't copy it to the gvm/lib dir)

timeline.bodyText: Collapse catch blocks. Instead of printStackTrace, use log.severe e.getMessage()?
timeline.author: jperedadnr
jperedadnr
